basic-info-page.title: Step 1. Enter Basic Information
basic-info-page.desc: Enter basic information to calculate daily calorie needs and obesity.
basic-info-page.new-kcal-set-prompt-desc: The calculated daily calorie needs based on your input is less than 1700 kcal. Please set your daily calorie needs to at least 1700 kcal to prevent ketosis during pregnancy.

day-exchange-unit-page.title: Step 3. Set Daily Food Exchange Units
day-exchange-unit-page.desc: Set the daily food exchange units.
day-exchange-unit-page.submit-btn: Step 4. Set Meal Food Exchange Units

meal-unit-page.title: Step 4. Set Meal Food Exchange Units
meal-unit-page.desc: Set the daily food exchange units.

nutrient-ratio-page.title: Step 2. Set Caloric Ratios
nutrient-ratio-page.desc: Set the intake ratios of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats that make up your daily calorie needs.

meal-detail-page.title: Food Exchange Unit Meal Plan Complete! üéâ
meal-detail-page.desc: Congratulations! Start a healthy meal with your completed food exchange unit meal plan!

meal-plan-page.empty-meal: First time? Calculate the food exchange units for each meal!
meal-plan-page.title: Food Exchange Units per Meal
meal-plan-page.update-title-alert-desc: Please edit the name of the meal plan. (within 30 characters)

home-page.title: Meal Calculator Using Food Exchange Table
home-page.desc: Customized nutrition information and food exchange unit calculation service
home-page.desc-1: for diabetic pregnant women for a healthy pregnancy journey.

signin-page.exist-email-with-different-provider-erro: This email is used with a different login method.

auth-reset-form.header-desc: Enter your email for password reset.

calc-hover.light-desc: Minimal physical activity, sedentary work, pregnant women
calc-hover.common-desc: Standing work, walking less than 1 hour
calc-hover.hard-desc: Walking more than 1 hour, daily exercise
calc-hover.carbo-desc: The recommended carbohydrate intake for pregnant women aged 19-50 is at least 175g per day. The appropriate carbohydrate ratio is 45 ~ 65%, and the Korean Diabetes Association recommends around 50%.
calc-hover.protein-desc: According to the Korean Nutritional Recommendations, the daily protein requirement is increased by 15g in mid-pregnancy and 30g in late pregnancy, based on the pre-pregnancy recommendation of 50-55g per day. The appropriate protein intake ratio is 10 ~ 35%.
calc-hover.fat-desc: The appropriate fat intake ratio is 20 ~ 35%.
calc-hover.kcal-title: Daily Caloric Needs for Pregnant Women
calc-hover.kcal-desc: During pregnancy, it is important to prevent ketosis by ensuring daily caloric intake does not fall below 1,700~1,800 kcal.

calc-alert.edit-meal-title-pl: e.g. Gestational Diabetes Diet - Final ver.
